resources.string: Ana - безопасное пространство для женщин. встретиться и найти поддержку.
Общайтесь с женщинами, которые находятся на аналогичном этапе жизни – от фертильности, беременности и материнства до менопаузы.
Ana предоставляет доступ к сообществу, которое готово выслушать, поделиться информацией и дать ценный совет
Please keep your username and password confidential. By continuing, you accept Ana\'s policies and terms and conditions
We also advise you to watch

Immerse yourself in a world of deep inner peace with this meditation. Tune into the moment of presence, free your mind from worry and tension. Allow yourself to immerse yourself in your thoughts, sensations and emotions without judging or becoming attached to them.

Immerse yourself in a world of deep inner peace with this meditation. Tune into the moment of presence, free your mind from worry and tension. Allow yourself to immerse yourself in your thoughts, sensations and emotions without judging or becoming attached to them. Breathe deeply, allowing each inhale to fill you with peace and each exhale to release tension. Allow yourself to be simply here and now, in this moment of complete peace and harmony
